docs.text: As a user, if I am already logged in, I would like to be able to log out home page If this is my first time opening the app, and I am still authenticated, I should start on the home page Expect: I should be on the home page I should not be on the login page. Events: AuthenticationEvent_Initialize Analytics: Screen: home login page If I attempt to log out, I should go to the login page Expect: I should now be on the login page. I should not be on the home page Actions: TAP: type "HomeC_LogoutButton" Events: AuthenticationEvent_Logout Analytics: Track: Logout Screen: login

docs.text: As a user, if I am not logged in, I would like to be able to login login page If this is my first time opening the app, I should start on the login page Expect: I should be on the login page I should not be on the home page. Events: AuthenticationEvent_Initialize Analytics: Screen: login home page If I attempt to log in, and I am authenticated, I should go to the home page Expect: I should now be on the home page. docs.text: As a user, if I attempt to login and authentication throws an error, I would like to be made aware login page If this is my first time opening the app, and I am not authenticated, I should be on the login page Expect: I should be on the login page I should not be on the home page. Events: AuthenticationEvent_Initialize Analytics: Screen: login login page If I attempt to log in, and the authentication throws an error, I should see a snackbar Expect: I should still be on the login page I should see a snackbar Actions: TAP: type "LoginC_LoginSuccessButton" Events: AuthenticationEvent_Login AuthenticationEvent_LoginFailed Analytics: Track: Login Attempted Track: Login Failed Screen: login
